root.name: Spyglass Board Games
root.description: Spyglass Board Games contains the board games: Chess, Checkers, Mancala and Reversi.Spyglass Board Games allows the player to play locally against the AI or on Xbox LIVE. When playing on Xbox LIVE the user has the option to use an Xbox LIVE Vision Camera and show a live feed of themselves to their opponent, although this is not required.Each of the four games has custom pieces that the user can unlock and use when they play, such as furry checkers pieces.
